formElement.label: Config Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration. To view or create a new configuration, go to the Administration -> Plugins tab, and select 'Configure' action for @PLUGIN_KEY@ plugin.
formElement.htmlDocumentation:
Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration.
A Configuration defines connection details and can be created by going to plugin configuration page.

formElement.label: Host Name:
formElement.documentation: Host name of Node Manager. This argument defaults to localhost.

formElement.label: Node Manager Port:
formElement.documentation: Port number of Node Manager. This argument defaults to a value that is based on the Node Manager server type, for plain type, defaults to 5556. For rsh type, defaults to 514. For ssh type, defaults to 22. For ssl type, defaults to 5556.

formElement.label: Domain Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the domain that you want to manage. This argument defaults to mydomain.

formElement.label: Domain Path:
formElement.documentation: Path of the domain directory to which you want to save the Node Manager secret file (nm_password.properties) and SerializedSystemIni.dat file. This argument defaults to the directory in which WLST was started.

formElement.label: WLST Absolute Path:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path to WLST. i.e: '/path/to/wlst.cmd' or 'wlst.sh'. (Required)

formElement.label: Node Manage Type:
formElement.documentation: Type of the Node Manager server. This argument defaults to ssl.

formElement.label: Maximum Elapsed Time:
formElement.documentation: Defines the time in seconds that the job wait to test the status of the node manager. Note that the step has a "Time Limit" property, so if this property is set to less than the parameter it will abort the step early. Blank implies no wait time (URL only checked one time).
